name: Guardian Shadow (Bug)
description:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The referent entity is a shadow manifested by the power of Stellaron, carrying out the Fragmentum's unceasing will to expand.
A physical manifestation of the desires of intelligent life in the Fragmentum, like a pearl created from a single grain of sand. This force wanders around aimlessly, acting only when executing the will of its master.

skills.name: Lightning Recollection
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to a single target.

skills.name: Lightning Condemnation
skills.description: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target.

skills.name: Tranquil Ban
skills.description: Your team is imposed with a ban on attacking the Guardian Shadow. Should anyone do so, they immediately receive 1 attack.

skills.name: Disarm Ban
skills.description: Your team is imposed with a ban on using Basic ATK. Should anyone do so, they immediately receive 1 attack.

skills.name: Silent Ban
skills.description: Your team is imposed with a ban on using Skill. Should anyone do so, they immediately receive 1 attack.

skills.name: Thunderstorm Condemnation
skills.description: Deals successive minor Lightning DMG to a random target, with a chance to inflict Shock.

skills.name: Inevitable Punishment
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to whoever violates the ban.
